text: Jisas takaw olap agak, Anɨb ak tek nɨbop agebin, tap akal nɨb dɨl tap mɨdup ñɨbɨl ñɨg ñɨbɨl yonɨgun, chech akal nɨb dɨl yɨmɨl yonɨgun agɨl, gos awl ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨŋɨd apin, pel mɨdep nɨbi ak tap awl yɨbɨl agak. God nɨbop gɨlak ak, tap ñɨŋeb nep pɨyow nɨgɨnɨgel, chech nep pɨyow nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl ma gɨlak agak.
